mapper.select: SELECT a.noteid,a.notetype,a.notename,CASE WHEN a.notetype='0' THEN b.electricitytext ELSE c.guidetext END AS notetext FROM t_note_info a LEFT JOIN (SELECT electricityid,electricitytext,'0' AS notetype FROM t_electricity_info) b ON a.noteid = b.electricityid AND a.notetype=b.notetype LEFT JOIN (SELECT guideid,guidetext,'1' AS notetype FROM t_guide_info) c ON a.noteid = c.guideid AND a.notetype=c.notetype WHERE a.noteid=#{noteid} AND a.notetype=#{notetype}
mapper.delete: delete from t_note_info where noteid=#{noteid} and notetype=#{notetype}
mapper.update: update t_note_info set noteid = #{noteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notetype = #{notetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notename = #{notename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateuser = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where notepk = #{notepk,jdbcType=INTEGER}
